task.title: How to Start the Calculator App
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to start the Calculator

prereq.p: To use the calculator app, you need to unlock your phone first.

context.p: You can use calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful, when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Calculator application icon

result.p: You are now ready to calculate with it.

taskbody.example: For example, if you have purchased a book for Rs.15 and you have given Rs.50, how much change should you expect? Answer is 50-15 = 35
